task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 353°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the building height accurately I need to see the roofline and base, so I should tilt the camera up while keeping the building centered.
I still need a better view of the building’s full vertical extent (roof and ground reference), so I should tilt back down to include the base while keeping the facade in view.
With the view now angled down, I should be able to approximate the number of stories from the visible facade and use a typical per-story height to estimate total building height.
